Data.//: Pickup Payments - Suppose someone wanted to add $1,000 to each
Data.//_: December payment. These types of payments are referred to as
Data.//-: 'pickup payments'. One replaces the desired payments with the new
Data.//!: payment definition. Since the default payment type is 'CalcPmt'
Data.//|: the following PmtStream definition defines December payments as
Data.//*: the calculated payment plus the specified 'Amount'.
